#summary jQuery plugin version
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= How to use jQuery plugin =

The usage of ie6no jQuery plugin is the same is of Standalone version.
Note, that IE6NO jQuery plugin supports only the version 6 of Internet Explorer.

= Details =

So, the difference is only that instead of ie6no you should use $.ie6no.
For example:
{{{
<script type="text/javascript">$.ie6no({runonload:true});</script>
}}}
